title: Exquisite Diamond Lakshmi Kasula Haaram Set with Jhumka Earrings
materials: South Sea Pearls. Meticulously crafted with authentic Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases a classic Lakshmi Kasula design intricately crafted with floral diamond settings. Features a central Ruby on a square setting, contrasted by the pendant with an Emerald center. Dangler South Sea Pearls enhance its elegance. The accompanying Jhumka earrings mirror the necklace's floral motif, culminating in a single pearl drop. The back of the jewelry is finished with exquisite filigree work.
colors: Predominantly gold with brilliant white diamonds
complemented by the deep red of the ruby and the vibrant green of the emerald. Soft white South Sea Pearls add a touch of classic refinement.
occasions: and other grand occasions. A cherished heirloom for generations
description: This Haaram set represents the pinnacle of South Indian jewelry artistry. Its combination of 22K gold, dazzling diamonds, and precious gemstones makes it a timeless investment. The Lakshmi Kasula design symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful gift and a treasured addition to any jewelry collection. Durability and timeless design ensure its value endures for generations.
